extendedInfo.description: The best selling iPhone App and Xbox Live Indie Game comes to Android - it's quite possibly the world's hardest game!With just one control, tapping the screen to jump, guide your orange square over spikes and jump onto blocks to get to the end of the level. Any mistake will result in instant death and a respawn at the beginning of the level. With an awesome soundtrack synced to the game youâll quickly become addicted!Also included is a Practice Mode, allowing you to lay checkpoints along the way. Try and unlock medals throughout the game, including beating the game with no flags. Check out the Stats page, where you can see how far you got through the level!Praise for The Impossible Game:"Insanely addictive"- Destructoid"Words can't describe how 'right' this feels."- DIYgamer"Fun and addictive as hell. What more could one want for one dollar?" 4.5/5- Hot Blooded GamingMore Info: http://flukedude.com/theimpossiblegameContact: info@flukedude.com

reviews.comment: Grate game very fun but the jumping is a little off compared to xbox Samsung galaxy tab. My droid x has a lot of lag. Update did not fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great addictive fun
reviews.comment: A lot of fun, and runs smoothly, but you must pay extra for all the levels. Evo 3d
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: One of my favourite games I have ever played. There needs to bd more that four levels though. Took me months to complete (still in the process) little tiny bit laggy at points but apart from that great game.
reviews.author: iamepicness123

reviews.title: LAG!
reviews.comment: This game worked amazing on my HTC Sensation 4G and was one of my favorite games! I upgraded my phone to a Samsung Galaxy Note 2 and now it lags incredibly bad! Please make it compatible with all devices 2 star until the problem is fixed and I will be telling all my friends to STAY CLEAR of this game.
reviews.author: Nate Pouncey

reviews.title: ?What do i do?
reviews.comment: My phone wont download (Galaxy Rush) it says error during download
reviews.author: todd jones

reviews.title: Your welcome people
reviews.comment: I just solved your laging problem if played with Wi-Fi at least a few times the lags will be gone for a few weeks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super addictive
reviews.comment: Extemely addictive and fun. Definately worth the 60 odd pence i paid for it...  *Was lagging on my Galaxy S3 but once the power saving is turned off it runs fine.*
reviews.author: Rachael Mackay

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: I bought it then it said check failed i have samsung galaxy tab 2 uninstalling
reviews.author: Reecio Chong

reviews.title: Cant get a refund.
reviews.comment: Great game. But with level pack out i want a refund for this game. Cant get it anymore. NOOOO!
reviews.author: Tyler Roberts

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Addicting, but I think there should be a level editor/maker tool so you can build your own levels and save them.
reviews.author: Josh Deland

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what\'s wrong with games such as Super Hexagon or this one. Games that are great on IOS suddenly suck hard on the Samsung S3. The framerate issues on this one ruins this game completely. They basically stole my money.
reviews.author: Logrus Jormungandr

reviews.title: Difficult
reviews.comment: Has anyone even beaten the first freaking level without practice mode?? Its a fun game but very hard.... called the impossible game for a reason...
reviews.author: Josh Pound

reviews.title: awesome game
reviews.comment: Awesome and addictive. For those having lag issues, make sure power saving is off. that fixed mine and a friends game.
reviews.author: Harley Hooper

reviews.title: Worked
reviews.comment: Worked great on my old HTC inspire but on my one x the frame rate is off as soon as you get to the first triple spike you die no matter what because when your suppose to jump it pushes the frame forward and your in the spikes please fix I have bought this game on my ps3 360 iPod and my android devices
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF rip off
reviews.comment: Only two levels and u have to pay another 99\302\242 for more levels not worth itit otherwise game is described as what it is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Out of sync on Android better suited for iPhone. Save your money, deserve a refund for this joke attempt from Android.
reviews.author: Taran Singh

reviews.title: Tyler
reviews.comment: They should let you change the color of the square I\'m kinda bored of the brownish orange.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its possible!
reviews.comment: Very addictive game. I have the whole collection on my phone and love em all. Only passed 2 levels (no flags) and it feels good to beat them haha anyways, its not laggy at all if you got good hardware specs. Its commom sense, don\'t blame the game!
reviews.author: Daniel Aroche

reviews.title: Too easy get the extra pack
reviews.comment: It\'s got more levels on the extended pack and is better value for money, way to easy , each level can be completed in about 1 min 30
reviews.author: stephen brazier
